metadata.title: CVE-2022-27455 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: MariaDB Server v10.6.3 and below was discovered to contain an use-after-free in the component my_wildcmp_8bit_impl at /strings/ctype-simple.c.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
